name: Black Jewel
description: You are Ryan, a barbarian warrior and you've got to keep back to the realm the Black Jewel, stolen by Darkor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 (or equivalent) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher, or Radeon 7000 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 15 MB available space
